author: Nancy Macdonald
title: ‘A ghost town’: With tourist access cut off, Banff unemployment soars
description: With the gates of Banff National Park closed to slow the spread of COVID-19, a local MLA says unemployment has hit 85 per cent
content:
The streets of Banff, Alta., sit empty on April 13, 2020. 
Todd Korol/The Globe and Mail
Banff Avenue is deserted. The Goats Eye Express is swinging empty above Sunshine Village. The tourists, apple-cheeked after a bluebird day on the local mountains, are l… [+7122 chars]
